  • Method Details

    • savePhone

      @PostMapping("/addPhone") public Phone savePhone​(@RequestBody Phone c)
      Postmapping for creating new Phone in the Database. And initializing our URL as "/addPhone". Then specifying our method savePhone. In the method, @RequestBody declares the body of the request that means and consider as Phone object.
      Parameters:
      c - is Phone type object that we want to add to our database.
      Returns:
      calling "savePhone" method from phoneService class to save new Phone object in the database.

    • getPhone

      @GetMapping("/getphone/{id}") public Phone getPhone​(@PathVariable int id)
      Getmapping for reading elements from Database. And initializing our URL as "/getphone/{id}" which want {id} to search for.
      Parameters:
      id - - is searching criteria for Phone
      Returns:
      calling "getPhone" method from phoneService class to return a Phone object from database.

    • getAllPhones

      @GetMapping("/getallphones") public List<Phone> getAllPhones()
      Returns:
      - it returns a List of Phone objects that means we are getting all phones from database.

    • getPhonesByBrand

      @GetMapping("/getallphonesbrand/{brand}") public List<Phone> getPhonesByBrand​(@PathVariable String brand)
      Parameters:
      brand - - is a key word for searching in Phone table.
      Returns:
      - it returns a list of phones with given brand keyword. Means this getmapping returns all the phones with the given brand keyword from database.
